lead_paragraph: A lawsuit accuses the group trying to bring skateboarding into the 2020 Olympics of skirting anti-doping rules and giving favors to an IOC official that led to the ouster of a rival group from the negotiating table.

headline.print_headline: Suit Questions Skateboarding Group's Anti-Doping Practices
headline.main: Suit Questions Skateboarding Group's Anti-Doping Practices

snippet: A lawsuit accuses the group trying to bring skateboarding into the 2020 Olympics of skirting anti-doping rules and giving favors to an IOC official that led to the ouster of a rival group from the negotiating table....
